name: Planet Golf
description:
You have to throw the golf ball to ME, in this space based golf game.

The aim of the game is to throw the ball to me, the frog, whilst getting the lowest score possible. Leave a comment if you manage to beat my best score of 28:)

Fullscreen recommended but not necessary.

Controls:

  • Hold and release the mouse to throw the ball
  • Scroll to zoom in and out

This game was created in roughly 3 hours for the trijam game jam using Godot Game engine.

Many thanks to the wonderful pixel planets generator, which generated all of the planets in this: https://deep-fold.itch.io/pixel-planet-generator

Its my first jam so please dont be too mean :D
